wikipedia_page.main: Celia Margaret Fremlin (20 June 1914 – 16 June 2009) was an award-winning writer of mystery fiction.

response: ;1960 Celia Fremlin, The Hours Before Dawn
His papers are archived at the University of Birmingham.  Celia Fremlin was his sister.
* 20 June – Celia Fremlin, writer of detective stories (died 2009)
* Tödliche Liebe (1986, TV film, based on a novel by Celia Fremlin)
* Im Schatten der Angst (1988, TV film, based on a novel by Celia Fremlin)
* Klippen des Todes (1993, TV film, based on a novel by Celia Fremlin)
* Die Stunden vor Morgengrauen (1997, TV film, based on a novel by Celia Fremlin)
